price: 难道你没有看见那等人吗？他们对安拉忘恩负义，并使自己的宗族陷于灭亡之境——
arabic: ۞ أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ بَدَّلُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ كُفۡرٗا وَأَحَلُّواْ قَوۡمَهُمۡ دَارَ ٱلۡبَوَارِ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna baddalū niʿ'mata al-lahi kuf'ran wa-aḥallū qawmahum dāra al-bawāri
